DESCRIPTION: Fly through an endless neon metropolis at night. Procedurally generated towers pulse with audio-reactive lighting, their glass facades reflecting cyan and magenta hues. The cityscape stretches infinitely ahead as you glide along a winding path through glowing streets. Features path-traced reflections, volumetric bloom, and glass refraction effects that interact beautifully with media layers.
TITLE: Neon City by Night
